hero.headline: About Pinnacle Realty Group
hero.subline: 12 years. $180M+ in sales. One mission: the most trusted brokerage in Westchester County.

blocks.body: Jane Smith founded Pinnacle Realty Group in 2014 with one conviction: that independent brokerages could out-serve the big franchises every single time — if they built a team of genuine local experts who cared deeply about outcomes. 12 years and 620 transactions later, that conviction has proven right.
We've grown from a one-person operation to 18 agents covering Westchester County's most sought-after communities. Every agent we hire is someone we'd trust with our own family's transaction.

items.name: Client-First Always
items.description: Every decision starts with one question: what's best for our client?

items.name: Deep Local Roots
items.description: We live here. We know every street, school, and market dynamic.

items.name: Honest Advice
items.description: We tell you the truth about pricing and strategy, even when it's not what you want to hear.

principalBroker.headline: Meet Jane Smith
principalBroker.title: Principal Broker & Founder
principalBroker.bio: Jane founded Pinnacle Realty Group after 6 years as a top-producing agent at a regional firm. Her vision: a brokerage where quality mattered more than volume, where agents were supported rather than just counted, and where clients got genuine expertise instead of a generic playbook. That vision shaped every hire, every training program, and every client interaction since.

community.headline: Community Involvement
community.body: Westchester County has given our team so much — and giving back is a responsibility we take seriously. Pinnacle Realty Group sponsors the annual Westchester Land Trust cleanup, supports Habitat for Humanity's local chapter, and provides pro-bono advisory services to first-generation homebuyers through our partnership with the Westchester Community Foundation.

items.quote: I came from a franchise where I was a number. At Pinnacle, I have a real broker who answers the phone, a team that collaborates, and the freedom to build my business my way.
items.name: Marcus Johnson

items.quote: Jane's mentorship in my first two years was worth more than any training program I could have paid for. This is where I'll build my entire career.
items.name: Sarah Rodriguez

cta.headline: Let's work together.
cta.subline: Whether you're ready to buy, sell, or explore what Pinnacle can offer your real estate career.
